00045 class ImageContainer_vector: public vector<TValue>

00080     class SpanIterator
00081     {
00082 
00083         friend class ImageContainer_vector<TPoint,TValue>;
00084 
00085     public:
00086 
00087         typedef std::bidirectional_iterator_tag iterator_category; 
00088         typedef TValue value_type;
00089         typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00090         typedef TValue* pointer;
00091         typedef TValue& reference;
00092 
00093         SpanIterator( const TPoint & p ,
00094                       const std::size_t aDim ,
00095                       ImageContainer_vector<TPoint,TValue> *aMap ) :   myDimension ( aDim ), myMap ( aMap )
00096         {
00097             myPos = aMap->linearized(p);
00098 
00099             std::cout<< "construct("<<myPos<<")"<<std::endl;
00100 
00101             //We compute the shift quantity
00102             shift = 1;
00103             for (unsigned int k=0; k < myDimension  ; k++)
00104                 shift *= (aMap->myUpperBound.at(k) - aMap->myLowerBound.at(k));
00105         }
00106 
00107         const TValue & operator*() const
00108         {
00109             return (*myMap)[ myPos ];
00110         }
00111 
00112         void setValue(const TValue &v)
00113         {
00114             (*myMap)[ myPos ] = v;
00115         }
00116 
00121         bool operator== ( const SpanIterator &it ) const
00122         {
00123             return ( myPos == it.myPos );
00124         }
00125 
00130         bool operator!= ( const SpanIterator &it ) const
00131         {
00132             return ( myPos != it.myPos );
00133 
00134         }
00135 
00140         void next()
00141         {
00142             myPos += shift;
00143         }
00144 
00149         void prev()
00150         {
00151             ASSERT((long int) myPos-shift>0);
00152             myPos -= shift;
00153         }
00154 
00159         SpanIterator &operator++()
00160         {
00161             this->next();
00162             return *this;
00163         }
00164 
00169         SpanIterator &operator++ ( int )
00170         {
00171             SpanIterator tmp = *this;
00172             ++*this;
00173             return tmp;
00174         }
00175 
00176 
00181         SpanIterator &operator--()
00182         {
00183             this->prev();
00184             return *this;
00185         }
00186 
00191         SpanIterator &operator-- ( int )
00192         {
00193             SpanIterator tmp = *this;
00194             --*this;
00195             return tmp;
00196         }
00197

00201 
00203         ImageContainer_vector<TPoint,TValue> *myMap;

00207 
00209         TSizeType shift;

00211     };

00218 
00219     SpanIterator span_begin(const TPoint &aPoint, const std::size_t aDimension)
00220     {
00221         return SpanIterator ( aPoint, aDimension, this);
00222     }
00223 
00224     SpanIterator span_end(const TPoint &aPoint,const std::size_t aDimension)
00225     {
00226         TPoint tmp = aPoint;
00227         tmp.at( aDimension ) = myLowerBound.at( aDimension ) + myUpperBound.at( aDimension ) - myLowerBound.at( aDimension ) + 1;
00228         return SpanIterator( tmp, aDimension, this);
00229     }
00230
